pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena saṅghaṁ uddissa vihāro kārāpito hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.3_0: So tassa vihārassa mahe ubhatosaṅghassa akālacīvaraṁ dātukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena ubhatosaṅghassa kathinaṁ atthataṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.5_0: Atha kho so upāsako saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṁ yāci.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.7_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.12_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho kathinaṁ uddhareyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.16_0: Yassāyasmato khamati kathinassa uddhāro, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.18_0: Ubbhataṁ saṅghena kathinaṁ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.1_0: Atha kho so upāsako bhikkhunisaṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṁ yāci.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.4_0: Atha kho so upāsako ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.5_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo amhākaṁ kathinuddhāraṁ na dassantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.6_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa upāsakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.7_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.8_0: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā dhammikaṁ kathinuddhāraṁ paṭibāhissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.9_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikaṁ kathinuddhāraṁ paṭibāhatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.12_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikaṁ kathinuddhāraṁ paṭibāhissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.14_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.15.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikaṁ kathinuddhāraṁ paṭibāheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.1.8_0: “kathaṁ idaṁ kathinaṁ na uddhareyyā”ti paṭibāhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
